attributes.title: Live from WZRD
attributes.caption: Mike becomes upset when Dani, a new student, joins him as co-host. Dani becomes entranced by a magical orb despite Mike’s warnings. Voice actor Sungwon Cho is guest.
attributes.description: Mike becomes upset when Dani, a new student, joins him as co-host. Dani becomes entranced by a magical orb despite Mike’s warnings. Voice actor Sungwon Cho is guest.

attributes.title: Spirit Week
attributes.caption: Spirit Week
attributes.description: It’s spirit week at East Gatewood when the studio’s magical orb goes missing. Brandon Rogers and the ghost from the library are guests.

attributes.title: The Smell
attributes.caption: The Smell
attributes.description: Something in the studio stinks. After Mike and Dani realize the missing orb has turned, Steve the Janitor volunteers to dispose of it. Comedian Yedoye Travis is guest.

attributes.title: Orbology
attributes.caption: Orbology
attributes.description: Mike and Dani air their grievances against East Gatewood and the school Registrar. An orb agent explains the deal with orbs.

attributes.title: The Portal
attributes.caption: The Portal
attributes.description: Mike and Dani are heartbroken after they lose the studio’s beloved floating camera to a magic portal. Comedian Baron Vaughn is guest.

attributes.title: Hijacked
attributes.caption: Hijacked
attributes.description: Steve the Janitor uses the studio’s missing camera to hijack the show. Mike and Dani vow to put an end to his rude (and deadly) interruptions. VFX artist Freddie Wong is guest.

attributes.title: Graduation
attributes.caption: Graduation
attributes.description: Mike realizes he must vanquish the registrar and finally graduate to save the school from Steve the Janitor. Comedians Paul F. Thompkins, Mamrie Hart, Grace Helbig, and Chris Gethard are guests.

attributes.title: Into the Void
attributes.caption: Into the Void
attributes.description: Dani and Mike go inside the void to destroy the orb, defeat Steve the Janitor and save the school. Comedian Rhea Butcher is guest.
